pages.title: Alchemy
pages.text: The goal of alchemy is the mastery of matter. Master $(thing)Hermeticists$() are said to be able to replicate any object and transform any material into any other. In other words: Unmeasurable riches await those understanding the manipulation of matter. The challenge seems to lie in attaining said mastery.

pages.title: Essentia
pages.text: All matter is made up of four primary elements, also known as $(thing)Essentia$(): $(#fcfc03)Aer$(), $(#00aeff)Aqua$(), $(#e89b00)Ignis$(), $(#008f0e)Terra$(). Finding a way to work with $(thing)Essentia$() should $(italics)theoretically$() allow manipulation of matter on a fundamental level.

pages.title: Prima Materia
pages.text: The possibly greatest mystery in the study of Hermeticism is $(thing)Prima Materia$(), a mystical substance made up of the four $(thing)Essentia$() in perfect balance. $(thing)Prima Materia() can be transformed into any material. While $(thing)Prima Materia$() is said to be all around, making it visible, stable and usable, is among the greatest challenges on the way towards mastery of alchemy.
